import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';

Sending an [NFT](/learn/protocols/stardust/core-concepts/multi-asset-ledger#non-fungible-tokens-nfts)
allows you to transfer ownership of the unique digital asset to another user. By sending an NFT you grant the new owner full control and possession of the token, including its
associated collectible or token value and any other attributes it defines.

## Example Code

<Tabs groupId="language" queryString>
<TabItem value="rust" label="Rust">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
2. Set `nft_id` as the first NFT Id retrieved by the [`Balance.nfts()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/types/balance/struct.Balance.html#method.nfts) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/nfts/send_nft.rs#L38
```

</div>

3. Define the outputs for the transaction as the [`SendNftParams`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/struct.SendNftParams.html).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/nfts/send_nft.rs#L44
```

</div>

4. Send the NFT transaction using the [`Wallet.send_nft()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html#method.send_nft) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/nfts/send_nft.rs#L48
```

</div>

5. Await for the transaction to be accepted by the network by calling the [`Wallet.wait_for_transaction_acceptance()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html#method.wait_for_transaction_acceptance) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/nfts/send_nft.rs#L51-L53
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="typescript-node" label="Typescript (Node.js)">

The following example will:

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Wallet) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
2. Set `nftId` as the first NFT Id in the balance.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/nfts/send_nft.ts#L44-L48
```

</div>

3. Define the outputs for the transaction as the [`SendNftParams`](../../references/nodejs/interfaces/SendNftParams.md).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/nfts/send_nft.ts#L50-L55
```

</div>

4. Create the transaction that will send the NFT using the [`Wallet.sendNft()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Wallet.md#sendnft) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/nfts/send_nft.ts#L58
```

</div>

5. Await for the [`Transaction`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Transaction.md) to get confirmed by calling the
[`Wallet.waitForTransactionAcceptance()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Wallet.md#waitfortransactionacceptance)
function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/nfts/send_nft.ts#L62
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python" label="Python">

The following example will:

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
2. Create the [`SendNFTParams`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/types/send_params/#sendnftparams-objects) setting `nft_id` as the first NFT Id in the [`Balance`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/types/balance/).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/nfts/send_nft.py#L20-L23
```

</div>

3. Send the NFT by calling the [`Wallet.send_nft()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/#send_nft) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/nfts/send_nft.py#L25
```

</div>

</TabItem>
</Tabs>

### Expected Output

```bash
Transaction sent: 0x58716bf9c7d3b36276a3ce9b57b43693c03bd6816198a7fe8ee1b814c424dae6
Block included: https://explorer.shimmer.network/testnet/block/0xd7ccfb7922a719dcee7e4bf15eaf3a6983c378b7a4c16adf34a3eb001cfc5773
```
